expo.name: Sakhi Suraksha
expo.description: A mobile application designed to promote menstrual hygiene, safety, awareness, and support for women and girls. It combines health tracking, emergency assistance, and resource accessibility into one easy-to-use app.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to help you find nearby stores with menstrual hygiene products.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses location to help you find nearby stores with menstrual hygiene products.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Sakhi Suraksha to use your location to find nearby stores.
